attributes.additional_details: despite being told by party leaders to vote to trigger article 50, she made a feeble excuse to avoid the vote, she also knowing the public views on mass immigration continues to push her pro immigration views regardless, also she has a long history of dubious and excessive expenses claims.
attributes.background: Diane Abbott is a disgrace to the position of MP, refusal to accept the will of the electorate and putting her own views above those of the British people regarding Brexit and immigration.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
